title: Toshiba to sell sensor business to Sony for around $165 million: sources
text:
Published By: Reuters - Technology - Today 
TOKYO (Reuters) - Toshiba Corp is set to sell its image sensor business to Sony Corp for around 20 billion yen ($164.68 million) as part of ...
